General.Name: Spackman Equit
General.Description: Spackman Equities Group Inc., an investment holding company, invests into and develops small/medium-sized growth companies in Asia. The company was formerly known as Centiva Capital Inc. and changed its name to Spackman Equities Group Inc. in October 2011. Spackman Equities Group Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: Scotia Plaza, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 3Y2
